Package index

On-the-Fly Query

esios2df()
Fetch ESIOS Time-Series as Data Frame
esios2lfdata()
Build daily curves into ldata object from ESIOS data

Annual Download & Functional Datra Conversion

esios2csv()
Fetch ESIOS Time-Series and Save as CSV Files
esios2fdata()
Read ESIOS CSVs or RDAs and transform into functional-data (fdata) objects
esios2ldata()
Read ESIOS CSVs or RDAs and build daily curves into ldata object

Information, Indicator Management and Calendar Utilities

esios2fd
esios2fd: Download and Convert ESIOS Indicators to Functional Data
esios2indicators()
Download ESIOS indicators metadata and augment with units
esios2resolution()
Detect Supported Time Resolutions for ESIOS Indicators
date2calendar()
Annotate Dates or Date-Times with Calendar Attributes
